trans-unit.source: Defines a design-time object that is used to build strongly-typed runtime grammars that conform to the [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://www.w3.org/TR/speech-grammar/).
trans-unit.target: Definisce un oggetto in fase di progettazione usato per compilare le grammatiche di runtime fortemente tipizzate conformi allo standard [SRGS (Speech Recognition Grammar Specification) versione 1.0](http://www.w3.org/TR/speech-grammar/).

trans-unit.source: You can you construct an empty <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> instance and build a grammar by adding instances of classes that represent SRGS elements, such as <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>,<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken>.
trans-unit.target: È possibile costruire un oggetto vuoto <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> istanza e compilare una grammatica aggiungendo istanze di classi che rappresentano elementi SRGS, ad esempio <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>,<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag>, e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken>.

trans-unit.source: You can also construct an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> instance from an existing SRGS-compliant XML grammar file, from an instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, or from an instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre possibile costruire un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> istanza da un file di grammatica SRGS conforme XML esistente, da un'istanza di <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, o da un'istanza di <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>.

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> object is created, it can be loaded into a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object or compiled by <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarCompiler>, enabling it to be read by a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object.
trans-unit.target: Dopo il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> oggetto viene creato, possono essere caricata in un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> dell'oggetto o compilato <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarCompiler>, consentendole di essere letta da un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: See [Create Grammars Using SrgsGrammar](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e4d9f96e-2241-4c39-b9e0-ac9ef4e9a906) in the [System Speech Programming Guide for .NET Framework 4.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/610116c7-3817-40ff-857b-5d41e8511043) for more information and examples.
trans-unit.target: Vedere [creare le grammatiche con SrgsGrammar](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e4d9f96e-2241-4c39-b9e0-ac9ef4e9a906) nel [sistema vocale Guida alla programmazione per .NET Framework 4.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/610116c7-3817-40ff-857b-5d41e8511043) per ulteriori informazioni ed esempi.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: Using the constructors for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> class, you can create an instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> from a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, or <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object, from a string that contains the path to an XML-format grammar, or you can initiate a blank instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzando i costruttori per la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> (classe), è possibile creare un'istanza di <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> da un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, o <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> dell'oggetto, da una stringa che contiene il percorso a una grammatica XML in formato, oppure è possibile avviare un'istanza vuota di <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates an empty <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> instance.
trans-unit.target: Questo costruttore crea un oggetto vuoto <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> istanza.

trans-unit.source: To build a grammar within an empty <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> instance, add instances of classes that represent SRGS elements, such as <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>.
trans-unit.target: Per compilare una grammatica all'interno di un oggetto vuoto <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> dell'istanza, aggiungere le istanze di classi che rappresentano elementi SRGS, ad esempio <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>, e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> object and then creates a public rule named `winnerRule`.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene creato un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> dell'oggetto e quindi crea una regola pubblica denominata `winnerRule`.

trans-unit.source: It then creates an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> that consists of the string "A nation that has won the world cup is:", and adds this item to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Elements%2A> property of the rule.
trans-unit.target: Crea quindi un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> che include la stringa "è un paese che ha vinto i mondiali:" e aggiunge questo elemento per il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Elements%2A> la proprietà della regola.

trans-unit.source: The example then creates two more rules (`ruleEurope` and `ruleSAmerica`), each of which is an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> object that contains three <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: L'esempio crea quindi due ulteriori regole (`ruleEurope` e `ruleSAmerica`), ognuna delle quali è un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> oggetto che contiene tre <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: After that, another <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> object is created that contains <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef> objects that refer to `ruleEurope` and `ruleSAmerica`.
trans-unit.target: Successivamente, un altro <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> viene creato un oggetto che contiene <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef> gli oggetti che fanno riferimento a `ruleEurope` e `ruleSAmerica`.

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> object is then added to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Elements%2A> property of `winnerRule`.
trans-unit.target: Il nuovo <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> oggetto viene quindi aggiunto al <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Elements%2A> proprietà `winnerRule`.

trans-unit.source: After this, all three rules (`winnerRule`, `ruleEurope`, and `ruleSAmerica`) are added to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Rules%2A> property of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: Successivamente, tutte e tre le regole (`winnerRule`, `ruleEurope`, e `ruleSAmerica`) vengono aggiunti per il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Rules%2A> proprietà di <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: Finally, the three rules are compiled into a binary representation of the grammar.
trans-unit.target: Infine, le tre regole vengono compilate in una rappresentazione binaria di grammatica.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder" /> object used to create the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder" /> utilizzato per creare l'istanza <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> class from a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> da un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example builds a grammar in a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> instance using <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices> objects.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente si basa una grammatica di un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> istanza utilizzando <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: It then creates an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> from the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> object.
trans-unit.target: Crea quindi un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> dal <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="builder" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="builder" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="root rule" /> in the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> object.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <see langword="root rule" /> nell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> class and specifies an <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule" /> object to be the root rule of the grammar.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> e specifica un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule" /> affinché sia la regola radice della grammatica.

trans-unit.source: This constructor adds the specified rule to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection> of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> object and sets it as the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Root%2A> rule for the grammar.
trans-unit.target: Questo costruttore aggiunge la regola specificata per il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection> del <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> dell'oggetto e lo imposta come il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Root%2A> regole della grammatica.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates two rules (`chooseCities` and `destCities`) for choosing origin and destination cities for a flight.
trans-unit.target: L'esempio seguente crea due regole (`chooseCities` e `destCities`) per la scelta di origine e destinazione città per un volo.

trans-unit.source: The example initializes the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> instance using the `chooseCities` rule as an argument.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio viene inizializzato il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> istanza utilizzando il `chooseCities` regola come argomento.

trans-unit.source: The example writes the contents of the rules collection and the name of the root rule to the console.
trans-unit.target: L'esempio scrive il contenuto della raccolta di regole e il nome della regola radice per la console.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="grammarRootRule" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="grammarRootRule" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The location of the SRGS XML file.
trans-unit.target: Percorso del file SRGS XML.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> class specifying the location of the XML document that is used to fill in the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> che specifica il percorso del documento XML utilizzato per compilare l'istanza <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a new <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> from the file named "srgsDocumentFile.xml".
trans-unit.target: L'esempio seguente crea un nuovo <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> nel file denominato "srgsDocumentFile.xml".

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: Il parametro <paramref name="path" /> è una stringa vuota.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> object that was created with the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> XML instance.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> creato con l'istanza XML <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> class from an instance of <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> that references an XML-format grammar file.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> da un'istanza dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> che fa riferimento a un file della grammatica in formato XML.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a new instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> from an instance of <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> that references the file "srgsDocumentFile.xml".
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente crea una nuova istanza della <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> da un'istanza di <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> che fa riferimento al file "srgsDocumentFile.xml".

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="srgsGrammar" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="srgsGrammar" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the assembly reference information for the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene le informazioni sui riferimenti dell'assembly per l'stanza <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.AssemblyReferences" /> property returns a string collection containing a list of the assembly references.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà di <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.AssemblyReferences" /> restituisce una raccolta di stringhe contenente un elenco dei riferimenti dell'assembly.

trans-unit.source: Gets the code-behind information for the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene le informazioni sul code-behind per l'istanza <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.CodeBehind" /> property returns a string collection that contains a list of the code-behind documents.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà di <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.CodeBehind" /> restituisce una raccolta di stringhe contenente un elenco dei documenti code-behind.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the culture information for the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta le informazioni sulle impostazioni cultura per l'istanza <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object that contains the current culture information for <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> contenente le informazioni relative alle impostazioni cultura correnti per <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Windows and the System.Speech API accept all valid language-country codes.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Windows e l'API Speech accettare tutti i codici paese di lingua validi.

trans-unit.source: To perform speech recognition using the language specified in the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Culture%2A> property, a speech recognition engine that supports that language-country code must be installed.
trans-unit.target: Per eseguire il riconoscimento vocale utilizzando la lingua specificata nel <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Culture%2A> proprietà, un motore di riconoscimento vocale che supporta che deve essere installato il codice paese di linguaggio.

trans-unit.source: The speech recognition engines that shipped with Microsoft Windows 7 work with the following language-country codes.
trans-unit.target: I riconoscimento vocale fornita con Microsoft Windows 7 funzionano con i seguenti codici di lingua, paese.

trans-unit.source: en-GB.
trans-unit.target: en-GB.

trans-unit.source: English (United Kingdom)
trans-unit.target: Inglese (Regno Unito)

trans-unit.source: en-US.
trans-unit.target: en-US.

trans-unit.source: English (United States)
trans-unit.target: Inglese (Stati Uniti)

trans-unit.source: de-DE.
trans-unit.target: de-DE.

trans-unit.source: German (Germany)
trans-unit.target: Tedesco (Germania)

trans-unit.source: es-ES.
trans-unit.target: es-ES.

trans-unit.source: Spanish (Spain)
trans-unit.target: Spagnolo (Spagna)

trans-unit.source: fr-FR.
trans-unit.target: fr-FR.

trans-unit.source: French (France)
trans-unit.target: Francese (Francia)

trans-unit.source: ja-JP.
trans-unit.target: ja-JP.

trans-unit.source: Japanese (Japan)
trans-unit.target: Giapponese (Giappone)

trans-unit.source: zh-CN.
trans-unit.target: zh-CN.

trans-unit.source: Chinese (China)
trans-unit.target: Cinese (Cina)

trans-unit.source: zh-TW.
trans-unit.target: zh-TW.

trans-unit.source: Chinese (Taiwan)
trans-unit.target: Cinese (Taiwan)

trans-unit.source: Two-letter language codes such as "en", "fr", or "es" are also permitted.
trans-unit.target: Codici di lingua di due lettere, ad esempio "en", "fr", o "es" sono inoltre consentiti.

trans-unit.source: The value being assigned to <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Culture" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore assegnato a <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Culture" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The value being assigned to <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Culture" /> is <see cref="P:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore assegnato a <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Culture" /> è <see cref="P:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether line numbers should be added to inline scripts.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se i numeri di riga devono essere aggiunti agli script inline.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Debug" /> property returns <see langword="true" /> if line numbers should be added for debugging purposes; otherwise the property returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà di <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Debug" /> restituisce <see langword="true" /> se i numeri di riga vengono aggiunti ai fini del debug, altrimenti la proprietà restituisce <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the related namespaces for the current <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene gli spazi dei nomi relativi all'istanza <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.ImportNamespaces" /> property returns a string collection that contains a list of the related namespaces in the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà di <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.ImportNamespaces" /> restituisce una raccolta di stringhe contenente un elenco degli spazi nome correlati nell'istanza <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the programming language used for inline code in the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il linguaggio di programmazione utilizzato per il codice inline nella classe <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Language" /> property returns the programming language to which <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> is currently set.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà di <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Language" /> restituisce il linguaggio di programmazione in cui <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> è attualmente impostato.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the mode for the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la modalità per la classe <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The recognition mode of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: La modalità di riconoscimento di <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Mode%2A> property returns a member of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarMode> that determines the type of input that the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> expects.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Mode%2A> proprietà restituisce un membro del <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarMode> che determina il tipo di input che di <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> prevista.

trans-unit.source: The two possible values are `Voice` for speech input, and `Dtmf` for input of dual-tone multi-frequency (DTMF) tones that are commonly associated with a telephone.
trans-unit.target: I due valori possibili sono `Voice` per l'input vocale, e `Dtmf` per l'input di tonalità dual più frequenze (DTMF) che sono comunemente associati a un telefono.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the namespace of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta lo spazio dei nomi della classe <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Namespace" /> property returns the namespace for the current <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Namespace" /> restituisce il nome degli spazi per <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> attuale.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the phonetic alphabet of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'alfabeto fonetico della classe <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the phonetic alphabet that must be used to specify custom pronunciations in the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce l'alfabeto fonetico da utilizzare per specificare le pronunce personalizzate nell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken" />.

trans-unit.source: Phonetic alphabets are composed of phones, which consist of letters, numbers or characters, sometimes in combination.
trans-unit.target: Alfabeto fonetico sono composti di telefoni, costituiti da lettere, numeri o caratteri, a volte in combinazione.

trans-unit.source: Each phone describes a unique sound of speech.
trans-unit.target: Ogni phone descrive un suono univoco della voce.

trans-unit.source: This is in contrast to the Latin alphabet, for which any letter may represent multiple spoken sounds.
trans-unit.target: Ciò si differenzia alfabeto latino, per cui qualsiasi lettera può rappresentare più pronunciate suoni.

trans-unit.source: Consider the different pronunciations of the letter "c" in the words "candy" and "cease", or the different pronunciations of the letter combination "th" in the words "thing" and "those".
trans-unit.target: Provare a diverse pronunce della lettera "c" in "candy di parole" e "termine", o diverse pronunce di combinazione di lettere "th" l'elemento"parole" e "".

trans-unit.source: In System.Speech, you can use any of three phonetic alphabets to specify custom pronunciations: International Phone Alphabet (IPA), Universal Phone Set (UPS), or the SAPI phone set.
trans-unit.target: In System. Speech, è possibile utilizzare uno qualsiasi dei tre alfabeto fonetico per specificare la pronuncia personalizzata: alfabeto telefono internazionale (IPA), Universal Phone impostare (UPS) o il SAPI phone set.

trans-unit.source: The specified phonetic alphabet determines which phone set will be used to define inline pronunciations for <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken> objects.
trans-unit.target: Nell'alfabeto fonetico specificato determina quale set di telefono che verrà usato per definire la pronuncia inline per <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: The phones specified in <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Pronunciation%2A> must match the phonetic alphabet specified in <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.PhoneticAlphabet%2A>.
trans-unit.target: I telefoni specificati in <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Pronunciation%2A> devono corrispondere nell'alfabeto fonetico specificato in <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.PhoneticAlphabet%2A>.

trans-unit.source: See [Lexicons and Phonetic Alphabets](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/435e3c6f-6834-4e5a-b0f6-c17b2275dc51) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Vedere [dizionari e caratteri dell'alfabeto fonetico](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/435e3c6f-6834-4e5a-b0f6-c17b2275dc51) per ulteriori informazioni.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the root rule of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la regola radice della classe <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the rule that is designated as the root rule of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce la regola designata come regola radice di <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object must already be in the document's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection> before it can be set to the **root rule**.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> oggetto deve essere già incluso il documento <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection> prima che possa essere impostato il **regola radice**.

trans-unit.source: You can also set the root rule for an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> object by using an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object as the argument to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> constructor.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre possibile impostare la regola radice per un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> oggetto utilizzando un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> oggetto come argomento per il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> costruttore.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a rule named `winnerRule`, and then creates an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> object named `document`.
trans-unit.target: L'esempio seguente crea una regola denominata `winnerRule`e quindi crea un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> oggetto denominato `document`.

trans-unit.source: The example then calls the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection.Add%2A> method to add the rule to the document.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio viene quindi chiamato il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection.Add%2A> metodo per aggiungere la regola al documento.

trans-unit.source: Finally, the example sets the document's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Root%2A> property to `winnerRule`, thereby making it the `root rule` for the grammar defined by the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> object.
trans-unit.target: Infine, nell'esempio viene impostato il documento <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Root%2A> proprietà `winnerRule`, creando così rendendo il `root rule` della grammatica definito dal <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of rules that are currently defined for the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la raccolta delle regole attualmente definite per la classe <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the rules defined for the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce le regole definite per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: You can add <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> objects to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection> by using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection.Add%2A> method on the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Rules%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: È possibile aggiungere <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> oggetti per il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection> utilizzando il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection.Add%2A> metodo il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Rules%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: If you initialize an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> object and specify an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object as the argument, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> is automatically added to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection> for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: Se si inizializza un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> e specificare un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> oggetto come argomento, la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> viene aggiunto automaticamente al <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection> per il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a grammar that recognizes the phrase "A nation that has won the World Cup is" followed by the name of a country that has won the World Cup.
trans-unit.target: L'esempio seguente crea una grammatica che riconosce la frase "è di un paese che ha vinto i mondiali" seguito dal nome di un paese che ha vinto i mondiali.

trans-unit.source: The example creates an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> object, and then creates a public rule named `winnerRule`.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio viene creato un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> dell'oggetto e quindi crea una regola pubblica denominata `winnerRule`.

trans-unit.source: After adding a string to the rule `winnerRule`, the example creates two more rules (`ruleEurope` and `ruleSAmerica`), each containing a list of countries.
trans-unit.target: Dopo l'aggiunta di una stringa alla regola `winnerRule`, nell'esempio vengono creati due ulteriori regole (`ruleEurope` e `ruleSAmerica`), ognuno dei quali contiene un elenco di paesi.

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection.Add%2A> method, the example adds all three rules (`winnerRule`, `ruleEurope`, and `ruleSAmerica`) to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Rules%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzando il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection.Add%2A> metodo, l'esempio aggiunge tutte le regole di tre (`winnerRule`, `ruleEurope`, e `ruleSAmerica`) per il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Rules%2A> proprietà del <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the .NET scripting language for the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il linguaggio di script .NET per la classe <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="Script" /> property returns the current .NET scripting language for the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> class.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see langword="Script" /> restituisce il linguaggio di script .NET corrente per la classe <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: This property has been deprecated.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà è stata deprecata.

trans-unit.source: Its use is no longer recommended.
trans-unit.target: L'uso non è più consigliato.

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set the <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Script" /> property to null.
trans-unit.target: Tentativo di impostare la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Script" /> su null.

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set the <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Script" /> property to an empty string.
trans-unit.target: Si è tentato di impostare la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Script" /> su una stringa vuota.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> that is used to write the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> utilizzato per scrivere l'istanza <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: Writes the contents of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> object to an XML-format grammar file that conforms to the [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761).
trans-unit.target: Scrive il contenuto dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> in un file di grammatica in formato XML conforme allo standard [SRGS (Speech Recognition Grammar Specification) versione 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761).

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> object, and then creates a public rule named `winnerRule`.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene creato un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> dell'oggetto e quindi crea una regola pubblica denominata `winnerRule`.

trans-unit.source: It then creates an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> that consists of the string "A nation that has won the world cup is:", and adds this item to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Elements%2A> property of the rule.
trans-unit.target: Crea quindi un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> che include la stringa "è un paese che ha vinto i mondiali:" e aggiunge questo elemento per il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Elements%2A> la proprietà della regola.

trans-unit.source: The example then creates two more rules (`ruleEurope` and `ruleSAmerica`), each of which is an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> object that contains three <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: L'esempio crea quindi due ulteriori regole (`ruleEurope` e `ruleSAmerica`), ognuna delle quali è un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> oggetto che contiene tre <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: After that, another <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> object is created that contains <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef> objects that refer to `ruleEurope` and `ruleSAmerica`.
trans-unit.target: Successivamente, un altro <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> viene creato un oggetto che contiene <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef> gli oggetti che fanno riferimento a `ruleEurope` e `ruleSAmerica`.

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> object is then added to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Elements%2A> property of `winnerRule`.
trans-unit.target: Il nuovo <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> oggetto viene quindi aggiunto al <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Elements%2A> proprietà `winnerRule`.

trans-unit.source: After this, all three rules (`winnerRule`, `ruleEurope`, and `ruleSAmerica`) are added to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Rules%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: Successivamente, tutte le regole di tre (`winnerRule`, `ruleEurope`, e `ruleSAmerica`) vengono aggiunti al <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Rules%2A> proprietà del <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: Finally, the example creates an empty XML file and an instance of <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.
trans-unit.target: Infine, nell'esempio viene creato un file XML vuoto e un'istanza di <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.WriteSrgs%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> instance to write the contents of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> to the XML file.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.WriteSrgs%2A> metodo utilizza il <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> istanza per scrivere il contenuto del <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> al file XML.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="srgsGrammar" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="srgsGrammar" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the base URI of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'URI di base della classe <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The current base URI of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: URI di base corrente di <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.XmlBase%2A> property gets a value that is used to resolve relative URIs in a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.XmlBase%2A> proprietà ottiene un valore che viene utilizzato per risolvere gli URI relativi in una <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Suppose the value for <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.XmlBase%2A> is "http://www.contoso.com/" and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> contains a relative rule reference to another document, for example `SrgsRuleRef("ExternalGrammar.grxml")`.
trans-unit.target: Si supponga che il valore per <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.XmlBase%2A> è "http://www.contoso.com/" e il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> contiene un riferimento di regola relativo a un altro documento, ad esempio `SrgsRuleRef("ExternalGrammar.grxml")`.

trans-unit.source: This creates the following absolute path to the external document: `http://www.contoso.com/ExternalGrammar.grxml`.
trans-unit.target: Verrà creato il seguente percorso assoluto del documento esterno: `http://www.contoso.com/ExternalGrammar.grxml`.
